title: 1. In a jar, add all the spices and shake until combined. 2. Season your favorite meats and vegetables with the rub. 3. Store in a tightly covered container, such as a mason jar, for up to a year.
directions: In a jar, add all the spices and shake until combined.
Season your favorite meats and vegetables with the rub.
Store in a tightly covered container, such as a mason jar, for up to a year.
